name: themed
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
designed according to a particular theme (= subject), or designed to relate to a particular place or time: This year the magazine began spotlighting a themed wedding in each issue, from "at the beach" to "on the ranch".
dealing with a particular subject: She presents a weekly science themed podcast.
More examplesFewer examplesTeam-building rituals include cricket matches, bowling expeditions and themed dress-up days.The amusement park has five themed areas - Mediterrania, Polynesia, China, Mexico and the Far West - with more than 30 rides and attractions. a Harry-Potter-themed partyThe ecologically-themed tale could have been improved by using a punchier title and shorter chapters.
